concept.title: Quick Start Step 3:
concept.shortdesc: During this step you will log into and use either command-line tools or the Horizon web console to create an sandbox environment.

stentry.b: Creating a Sandbox Environment Using the Horizon Web Console
stentry.p: The Horizon web console offers a visual user interface for configuring for .
In this workflow, it is not necessary to run Neutron and Nova command-line interface (CLI) commands and Horizon can also automatically generate your openrc.sh file.
stentry.b: Creating a Sandbox Environment From the Command Line
stentry.p: To exercise more control and to view more detailed system messages you can use CLI tools to configure for .
In this workflow, you must run Neutron and Nova CLI commands and you must also create your own openrc.sh file.
